Project Description

This project allows you to quickly develop applications using a core framework that incorporates various patterns including MVVM, MessageBus, IOC/DI and more.

This project currently caters for applications being developing using WPF or WinForms based business applications.

Note that full WinForms support is still WIP.

The main features include :-
  • Comprehensive Model implementation including change tracking, validation and property change monitoring and delegation
  • Loose coupling via the built-in MessageBus
  • DesignTime View display, and automatic view resolution
  • IOC/DI implementation
  • Base Disposable implementation used throughout
  • Built-in Model validation
